title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4207.24 - Bookmakers barred
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4207.24 - Bookmakers barred

State Regulations

All persons found making book on the races at any track
shall be barred therefrom by the association operating the same, for not less
than the duration of the meeting, and a memorandum thereof forthwith
transmitted to the commission and to the district attorney of the county in
which the offense has been committed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4207.24

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
